problem_text_cn: 如图,两个同心圆的半径分别为3cm和5cm,弦AB与小圆相切于点C,则AB=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the radii of the two concentric circles are N_0 and N_1 respectively, and the chord AB is tangent to the small circle at point C, then AB = ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OA,OC,∵AB与小圆相切,∴OC⊥AB,∴C为AB的中点,即AC=BC=\frac{1}{2}AB,在Rt△AOC中,OA=5cm,OC=3cm,根据勾股定理得:AC=√{OA^{2}-OC^{2}}=4cm,则AB=2AC=8cm．故选:D．
raw_comment: 此题考查了切线的性质,勾股定理,以及垂径定理,熟练掌握切线的性质是解本题的关键．
